TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProcessModelInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含傳回背景工作處理序相關資訊的方法。

span.span: Contains methods that return information about worker processes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別並非要您自己的程式碼中具現化。The class is not meant to be instantiated in your own code. 使用靜態和填入方法物件，然後再使用的屬性取得處理序的相關資訊的物件。Use the static and methods to populate objects, and then use the properties of the objects to obtain information about the processes. > [!NOTE] > 和只能與 Microsoft 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 版本 5.0 Microsoft Windows 2000 和 Windows XP 上或在 Windows Server 2003 中以及使用 IIS 5.0 隔離模式的 IIS 6.0 與使用方法。The and methods can be used only with Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) version 5.0 on Microsoft Windows 2000 and Windows XP or with IIS 6.0 on Windows Server 2003 and using IIS 5.0 isolation mode. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 設定 ASP.NET 版本的 ASP.NET 應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3e2037d2-61aa-44f3-b84e-d4dab3572ad3)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Configure ASP.NET Applications for an ASP.NET Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3e2037d2-61aa-44f3-b84e-d4dab3572ad3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以在網頁上顯示目前正在執行的 ASP.NET 處理序的相關統計資料。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to display statistics about the currently executing ASP.NET process on a Web page. 此範例運作與網際網路資訊服務 5.0 在 Windows 2000 和 Windows XP 或 Windows Server 2003 及使用 IIS 5.0 隔離模式的 IIS 6.0。This example will work with Internet Information Services 5.0 on Windows 2000 and Windows XP or with IIS 6.0 on Windows Server 2003 and using IIS 5.0 isolation mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/CS/processinfo1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/VB/processinfo1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.ProcessInfo GetCurrentProcessInfo() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCurrentProcessInfo () As ProcessInfo

summary.span: 傳回執行目前要求的背景工作處理序的相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about the worker process that is executing the current request.

returns.span: ，含有關於目前處理序的資訊。

span.span: A that contains information about the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是只適用於 ASP.NET 處理序模型下執行的應用程式。The method is applicable only for applications that are running under the ASP.NET process model. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以在網頁上顯示目前正在執行的 ASP.NET 處理序的相關統計資料。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to display statistics about the currently executing ASP.NET process on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/CS/processinfo1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.ProcessModelInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ProcessModelInfo/VB/processinfo1vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 處理序資訊無法供目前要求使用。

span.span: Process information is not available for the current request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.ProcessInfo[] GetHistory(int32 numRecords) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHistory (numRecords As Integer) As ProcessInfo()

param.name: numRecords
param.span: 要求資訊的處理序的數目。

span.span: The number of processes for which information is requested.

summary.span: 傳回最近背景工作處理序的相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about recent worker processes.

returns.span: 最近使用的 物件 (最多 100 個) 之陣列，如果可用的物件數目小於 ，則為所有可用的物件。

span.span: An array of the most recent objects (up to 100); otherwise, if the number of available objects is less than , all available objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是只適用於 ASP.NET 處理序模型下執行的應用程式。The method is applicable only for applications that are running under the ASP.NET process model.
